```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(viridis)
```

read in the data
```{r}
alice_counties <- fread(here("/data/alice/alice_counties.csv")) %>%
  mutate(County = paste0(County, " County, " ,State_Abbr),
         Wasco = fct_other(County, keep = c("Wasco County, OR"), other_level = "Neighboring Counties")) %>%
  select(-c("GEO.id" ,"GEO.display_label","State","State_Abbr","Poverty_Household","ALICE_Household"))
```


Visualize with the grouped line chart
```{r}
ggplot(alice_counties, aes(x = Year, y=Percent_ALICE_Households, ,group = County, color = Wasco)) +
  geom_line() + 
  scale_color_manual(values = viridis(2, option = "D"), name = "Region", labels = c("ok", "fine")) +
  theme_minimal()
```
